p: Human lung carcinoma epithelial cells (A549) and Madin-Darby Canine Kidney cells (MDCK) were obtained from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC, Manassas, VA) and were grown at 37°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO 2 in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM; Gibco) supplemented with 10% (v/v) fetal bovine serum (Gibco), 100 U/mL penicillin, and 100 μg/mL streptomycin.
